name: Crazteroids
description:
Crazy Retro Games take on a asteroid type game

A Game coming to PC, Browser & Google Play.

Stay tuned for exciting developments for this hyper casual arcade retro inspired game

You may play the prototype in browser now. Enjoy

A - Left

D - Right

W - Thrust

S - Shoot

#Crazteroids

Tip: If you want fullscreen do so before the load is complete or, well you know bugs 'n all.

Credits:

Sound FX fromhttps://mattflat.itch.io/rts-and-fps-sound-effects-asset-pack

Background music loop - Dead Planet by https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music
